title: A Decentralized Voting System for a Better World
hero.description: Introducing a blockchain-based, decentralized voting system, fortified by our patented TrustZone-backed trusted computing technology.

feature.title: Privacy
feature.desc: De.Vote is engineered with privacy at its core. Our commitment is to ensure your votes and personal data remain untraceable, even to system administrators.

feature.title: Justice
feature.desc: We guarantee that every piece of data originates from its claimed source, thereby contributing to authentic election results.

feature.title: Verifiable
feature.desc: With De.Vote, you can verify your votes to ensure your voice is truly counted.

title: About
Us
about.intro: De.Vote is a nonpartisan organization spearheaded by Professor Ren-Song Tsay of the Logos Lab at National Tsing Hua University.
about.left: We are the most trusted provider of secure and anonymous voting solutions.

middle.title: Our Team
middle.content: Our team comprises information security experts, blockchain researchers, and seasoned product designers from National Tsing Hua University.

right.title: Our Goal
right.content: Our mission is to make every vote and election trustworthy, highly efficient, and secure with the De.Vote system.

row1.name: Ren Song Tsay / Instructor
row1.role: Founder of two high-tech companies in Silicon Valley, both of which were successfully acquired.
row1.specialty: Expertise: Embedded System Verification, Blockchain and Its Applications, Decentralized IoT Architecture

row1.name: Wei En Tsai / CEO
row1.role: Brings a wealth of experience in development and entrepreneurship competitions.
row1.specialty: Expertise: Leadership, Tech Development, Information Security

row1.name: Guan Xue Li / COO
row1.role: Doctoral dissertation on high security, high scalability electronic voting technology.
row1.specialty: Expertise: Cryptography, Blockchain and its applications

row2.name: Tzu Hsuan Su / CTO
row2.role: Specializes in blockchain project development and scalable system architecture design.
row2.specialty: Expertise: Large-scale system design, blockchain technology development

row2.name: Hsiang Ting Peng / CMO
row2.role: Possesses rich capabilities in data analysis and integration.
row2.specialty: Expertise: Information security information collection and analysis, project management

row2.name: Borhan Lee / CFO
row2.role: Experienced in developing bitcoin hardware wallets based on TrustZone, with a deep understanding of blockchain and security issues.
row2.specialty: Expertise: Program Development, TrustZone Security Chip Development
